channel.title: Just want to apologize for my blank posts
channel.description:
ive posted a few pointless things ive figured out on my own, i know you dont like spam and everything. i have mark the ones not to pay attention to with a "-" mark, the ones without have to many replies (3-4 :P ), or are the one i actually need help on.
sorry for any who are frusturated by this. :palm:

item.title: Just want to apologize for my blank posts
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

WTF is this even Moparscape anymore…

Read full topic
item.source: Just want to apologize for my blank posts

item.title: Just want to apologize for my blank posts
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“tL, post:4, topic:547063”]There are threads that you have edited to blank which have had a reply with an answer, don’t remove posts that have had an answer because even if it doesn’t help you, it may help others in some way when they’re searching. Forums are good because of the archive of posts that can be found which potential answers, if everyone used forums in this way (removing once you’ve done), it’d take a lot of the effectiveness out of them.

Examples like this:

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,665495.0.html
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,665678.0.html[/quote]Now we don’t have any examples for when someone finds this thread years later and wants to find out what not to do to their own posts!

Read full topic
item.source: Just want to apologize for my blank posts

item.title: Just want to apologize for my blank posts
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

tL:

There are threads that you have edited to blank which have had a reply with an answer, don’t remove posts that have had an answer because even if it doesn’t help you, it may help others in some way when they’re searching

oh, yeah, didnt think of that.(ill change those) and thanks guys, its good to know that you understand stuff, thanks

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,665495.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,665678.0.html i changed these back! :cool:

Read full topic
